## Check Text Hits full model

```{r check-function}
check_hits <- function(search_terms_full_model, text) {
  any(sapply(search_terms_full_model, function(t) grepl(t, text, ignore.case = TRUE)))
}

comparison_matrix_full_model <- data.frame(
  bib_data = sapply(search_terms_full_model, check_hits, text = paste(bib_texts, collapse = " ")),
  gov_review = sapply(search_terms_full_model, check_hits, text = paste(gov_text, collapse = " ")),
  lit_review = sapply(search_terms_full_model, check_hits, text = paste(col_text, collapse = " "))
)
```

## Summary Table full model

```{r summary-table}

# Add numeric sum and evidence strength labels
comparison_matrix_full_model$support_score <- rowSums(comparison_matrix_full_model[ , c("bib_data", "gov_review", "lit_review")])

comparison_matrix_full_model$evidence_strength <- cut(
  comparison_matrix_full_model$support_score,
  breaks = c(-1, 0.5, 1.5, 2.5, 3),
  labels = c("None", "Weak", "Moderate", "Strong"),
  right = TRUE
)

knitr::kable(comparison_matrix_full_model, caption = "Model Component Evidence Presence")
```
